Translations.Text: Recall Moses sought zavlazit jeho ludia! My said Strike rock tvoj staff Whereupon 12 jaro gushed out therefrom members each tribe zauzlit ich own zavlazit. Jestn pne GOD's provisions nie roam zem corruptingly

Recall lenze ona said O Moses my ziaden longer tolerate jeden laskavy z food vola sa tvoj Lord produce us such earthly zozat fazula cucumbers cesnak lentils cibula. He said ona zelat zastupid ze kto inferior ze kto je bol dobry? Ist nadol Egypt ona zalozit co ona ziadat They incurred condemnation humiliation disgrace brought upon themselves zloba z GOD This because they zamietnut GOD's revelations killed prophets unjustly! This they disobeyed transgressed

Iste those verit those bol Zidovsky Christians converts ktokolvek kto (1) verit v GOD (2) verit v Posledny Dni (3) leads righteous zivot receive ich recompense ich Lord They have nothing fear nor will they rmutit sa
My robit covenant ona mat rad my chov Mount Sinai ona Ona uphold co my dat ona strongly zapamatat si its contents lenze ona saved
Ona turned thereafter a it je for GOD's grace ona Jeho zlutovanie ona doomed
Ona zauzlit about those among ona desecrated Sabbath. My said do them Bol ona mat rad despicable mat rad apes
My set them vzor ich generation i mat rad subsequent generations enlightenment for the righteous
Moses said do jeho ludia GOD commands ona sacrifice heifer. They said Je ona mocking us? He said GOD zakazat, ja behave zaluba ignorant jeden
They said Vola Sa tvoj Lord show us kto jeden. He said He says ona bol heifer bol neither i stara nor i young z intermediate vek! Teraz beriem co ona commanded robit
They said Vola Sa tvoj Lord show us ju color He said He says ona bol zlty heifer chapavy colored prosim beholders
They said Vola Sa tvoj Lord show us kto 1! heifers look alike do us GOD willing my guided
He said He says ona bol heifer never humiliated plowing zem zavlazit zozat; volny z any blemish They said Teraz ona brought truth. They finally sacrificed ju this lengthy reluctance
Ona killed soul potom disputed yourselves. GOD bol expose co ONA tried ZATAJIT
My said Strike (victim) part heifer.) Ze when GOD brought victim chrbat zivot showed ona Jeho znamka lenze ona chapat

Despite this tvoj srdce hardened mat rad rocks vecer harder there bol rocks rieka gush out. Others lamat release gentle streams inak rocks cringe reverence GOD GOD JE never unaware Z anything ONA ROBIT
